topic.title: Detected Issue Order Revision - conformance rules

section.p: Provides a record of a revision to the originally proposed Order Action - the resulting revision reflecting a decision to change the Order Action based on information presented by the Detected Issue (aka Order Check).

ol.li:
Contains zero or more [0..*] orderAction, where its type is Order Action
Identifies a new Order Action record that was created as a revision to a previously proposed Order Action due to information presented by a Detected Issue (aka Order Check).

Contains zero or more [0..*] orderAction, where its type is Order Action
Identifies a new Order Action record that was created as a revision to a previously proposed Order Action due to information presented by a Detected Issue (aka Order Check).
